r.d: This program reformat and beautify PHP source code files automatically. The program is Open Source and distributed under the terms of PHP Licence. It is written in PHP 5 and has a command line tool.
r.n: - Bug fix: Shorts comments after T_END_HEREDOC or another short comment starts in the same line. - Bug fix[1597]: Open brace after short comment starts in the same line. * Bug fix[1598]: With Default Filter, open and close tags maintains current whitespace. So, html with included php looks better * Custom streams in PHP5RC.x have a bug on stream_feof. setInputFile() on PHP_Beautifier not use feof. + Added support for input tgz and tar.bz2 files. This feature is handled by streams (PHP_Beautifier_StreamWrapper_Tarz->tarz://file.tgz#myfile.php) + Added more standard and internal tests with mock-a-like object in + Added Beautifier_Bugs.phpt for bug fix test. + Added Beautifier_StreamWrapper.phpt for streams tests. + Added example: example_html test/Beautifier.phpt
